participant_1.background:
I am a competitive body builder.
My personal ideal is theodore roosevelt.
I am color blind and live with my little sister.
My favorite singer is tim mcgraw.
I ran a blog about rabbit rescues.

participant_2.background:
I have always wanted a big family.
I am a married mother of a kids.
When i have some spare time i read.
My husband runs his own business.

content.text: Hello, I'm [user 1 name].
Hello, I'm [user 2 name].
I'm a competitive body builder. What do you do for a living?
I'm a mother to two children and I love to read.
That's great! I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially fond of historical fiction.
That's a great choice. I love historical fiction too. I've been reading a lot about Theodore Roosevelt lately.
Oh, I love Theodore Roosevelt! He was such an amazing man.
He was. I'm a big fan of his.
Me too. I think he was one of the greatest presidents we've ever had.
I agree. He was a true American hero.
He was. I'm so glad we had him as our president.
Me too. I think he would be a great role model for your kids.
I think so too. I'll have to tell them about him more often.
That's a great idea. I'm sure they'd love to hear about him.
I know they would. They love hearing stories about the past.
That's great. I'm glad they're interested in history.
Me too. I think it's important to learn about the past so we can understand the present and the future.
I agree. History is a great way to learn about the world.
It is. I'm glad you're a fan of history too.
Me too. I think it's one of the most important subjects we can study.
